edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel

Interface Malicious

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Covert, OneSidedSimulation, ProtocolSecLevel, SecurityLevel, SemiHonest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CTBlumPartyOne, CTBlumPartyTwo, CTStringPartyOne, CTStringPartyTwo, OTExtensionMaliciousReceiver, OTExtensionMaliciousSender, OTFullSimDDHOnByteArrayReceiver, OTFullSimDDHOnByteArraySender, OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementReceiver, OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementSender, OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArrayReceiver, OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArraySender, OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementReceiver, OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementSender, OTUCDDHOnByteArrayReceiver, OTUCDDHOnByteArraySender, OTUCDDHOnGroupElementReceiver, OTUCDDHOnGroupElementSender

    public interface Malicious
extends Covert, OneSidedSimulation
    Any protocol that is secure in the presence of malicious adversaries should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
